## Blog Overview

Welcome to my blog! This blog is a part of my ETC5523 Blog Assessment. Throughout this blog, I will share my learning journey and showcase the analysis projects that I've completed during this course. 

### What You Will Find Here
- **Assignment 2 Summary:** Analysis of major contributors to global carbon emissions using the Carbon Majors Database.
- **Data Analysis Techniques:** An exploration of data cleaning, visualization, and statistical analysis techniques using R.
- **Visualizations and Insights:** Various charts and tables to highlight key findings from different datasets.

Feel free to navigate through the different posts to see the analysis and conclusions drawn from real-world datasets.
